@mk2's public utilities for Egg, Inc.

Hosted at this domain

Interactive apps

  • Artifact explorer — Explorer for everything artifacts
  • Artifact sandbox — Experiment, optimize, and share your artifact builds all within this sandbox
  • Rockets tracker — Tracker for active rocket missions, historical mission statistics, progress on artifact collection, etc.
  • Past contracts viewer — Past contracts and prophecy egg completion tracker

Data sheets

  • Artifact list
  • Mission list
  • Consumption sheet — Artifact consumption outcomes

Developer tools

  • Proto explorer — Decode raw API payloads

Self-hosted

  • EggContractor — contract monitoring web app & CLI client

All tools above are open source.

You can find the author on the Egg, Inc. Discord server.
